Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.gameObject.graphics.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject, Paintable, Movable, UpdateListener, java.lang.Comparable<GameObject>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball, BreakOut_Ball, Brick, Building, Pad, Racket, Score, TestInputSprite, TestSprite

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements Paintable, Movable, UpdateListener

    1.0

      • update

        public void update(long timeMillis)
        Description copied from interface: Movable

        Used to update the movement based on the time passed since the last update.

        Note:
        Should be implemented so that the Dynamic x and y equal to pixels per second.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Movable
        Specified by:
        update in interface UpdateListener
        Parameters:
